snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton, apparently alluding to Donald J. Trump, says, “There is one particular candidate who just seems to delight in insulting women every chance he gets.”
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, apparently alluding to Donald J. Trump, says, “There is one particular candidate who just seems to delight in insulting women every chance he gets.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Takes Aim at Donald Trump for ‘Insulting Women’
